GSD.description:
scsi: scsi_debug: Sanity check block descriptor length in resp_mode_select()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.259 by commit 90491283b4064220682e4b0687d07b05df01e3bf. For more details please see the references link.
